string.text: Swamp living tends to take its toll on us. Many of our members are coming down with illness owing to staying out late on recon and having to deal with the cold and wet. If you can help us with getting some over the counter medicine, we'll provide you some of the surplus scientific equipment we have.

One of the anomalies in this swamp, I won't say which one, seems to produce a continuous, but small, amount of fuel. How it works is a faction secret, but it solves our fuel needs permanently. If you can bring us some meat, we'll be happy to trade.
Your help is appreciated, man. We gotta keep our boys alive.

Trekking out of these swamps is a pain for our couriers, especially those who have to carry a lot of gear. If you can get us some equipment to lighten our load, I'll give you some old weapons we have laying around.
Your help is appreciated, man. We gotta keep our boys alive.
Being out here degrades our equipment rapidly, especially with all the mud and other things. If you can spare any cleaning or repairing supplies, we'll be very grateful.
Thanks. Here's something to kill the time.

An old man like me needs to keep busy, and I keep busy best by working on protective gear. That jacket of yours? That's not going to keep you alive long out here - bring me a few items and I'll fit that into a proper stalker's suit.

How's that suit treating you? Want something better suited for anomalies? I can try and fit a gas mask or something on there, as well as add a simple protective layer. I have the gas mask, but I need a few more things in order to install it.
Is that a bullet hole? If you plan on getting into firefights, you'll need a plate carrier at least and not just a kevlar vest. I have the tools, but I'll need some material to put it together.

I can arrange to install an exoskeleton onto your suit. I have a contact working with Sakharov who can supply me the electroics, so in addition to the usual stuff I'm going to need a bottle of Nemiroff.
Our last shipment came with an SCBA and Screen helmet, which they salvaged from some poor Ecologist. If you get me a few more things, I might be able to upgrade that NBC suit into a SEVA.
That armored suit holding up ok? If you want some extended protection, I can arrange for that. Here's a list of what i need.

Hey stalker, I got some good news. One of my military contacts managed to trade me the schematics for advanced SKAT-9 armor for a few favors. I should be able to retrofit your heavy suit to incorporate most of the new features. It will end up being a well-rounded suit, but this is unfortunately the most I can do for it.

Three of my guys dragged in this military stalker in an exoskeleton that cooked to death in a steam anomaly. Most of the hardware was pretty badly damaged but we were able to salvage the helmet and some of the frag suit. I can upgrade your heavy armor into an Exosuit, but I'll need a lot of extra parts. Also, I can't guarantee the smell will go away.

I have an agreement with the Duty faction to supply them special suits in exchange for general supplies. If you bring me the right things, I can modify your suit to grant it enhanced protection. This will be tricky as the armor treatment makes use of a few artifacts, but we'll be able to upgrade more than just your suit if you help me out.

Good news, we got a replacement servomotor control unit. The one off the military stalker suffered too much steam damage. I had to call in a favor for it from one of our Ecologist contacts, so in addition to the usual stuff I'm going to need a bottle of Nemiroff.
Wear it well, stalker. Come by later, I might think of further improvements.
